suggestions.original: To improve the color contrast in the artwork, consider using darker shades for the background elements like the sun and airplane to make them stand out more against the lighter background. Additionally, using more contrasting colors for the dresses and the background elements can help to further distinguish different parts of the artwork. For example, using a darker blue or green for the airplane and sun, and incorporating more varied and contrasting colors for the dresses, can create a more striking visual impact. Enhancing the outlines of the characters and elements with a darker color can also help to improve the overall contrast and make the scene more visually engaging.
